sources.title: Escapee | Full Movie | Horror Thriller | Dominic Purcell | Christine Evangelista
sources.description:
Escapee - While on a class trip at a local mental hospital, Abby Jones has a chilling encounter with high-risk patient, Harmon Porter. She returns home, unaware of the darkness she’s awakened within him. Later that evening a storm moves in as Harmon makes his way to an unsuspecting Abby. The storm darkens the neighborhood and traps them in Harmon’s web of terror.
2011.  Stars: Dominic Purcell, Christine Evangelista, Melissa Ordway

metadata.Plot: While on a class observation trip at a local mental hospital, young psychology major Abby Jones (Christine Evangelista), has a chilling encounter with high-risk patient, Harmon (Dominic Purcell). She returns home for an evening of normal study with her two roommates unaware of the darkness shes awakened within him. Later that evening a storm moves in, while Harmon escapes leaving a trail of death, as he makes his way toward an unsuspecting Abby. Meanwhile, Abby and her roommate Lynn (Carly Chaikin) receive a visit from Carter Thomas (Scott Elrod), the neighbor cop across the street, warning them about a local peeper lurking in the area.
metadata.Actors: Dominic Purcell, Christine Evangelista, Melissa Ordway
